  1. Initialize a project

    1. install ng (Angular CLI): npm install -g @angular/cli
    2. initialize new project and use scss as stylesheet: ng new my-app — — style=scss # my_app is invalid
    3. install common modules:
      1. material: npm install --save @angular/material @angular/cdk @angular/animations
      2. hammerjs (gesture recognition): npm install --save hammerjs
      3. flex-layout (not recommend): npm install --save @angular/flex-layout
    4. Go to index.html import common code and stylesheet
      1. google material font: <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/icon?family=Material+Icons" rel="stylesheet">
      2. font-awesome: <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://use.fontawesome.com/releases/v5.1.0/css/all.css" integrity="sha384-lKuwvrZot6UHsBSfcMvOkWwlCMgc0TaWr+30HWe3a4ltaBwTZhyTEggF5tJv8tbt" crossorigin="anonymous">
    5. ng serve --open # developing
    6. ng build --prod # build

    Project structure

        project/
        src/
            index.html
            main.ts
            styles.scss
            assets/
                img/
            app/
                services/
                data-structure/
                utilities/
                component1/
                component2/
                    component.html
                    component.scss
                    component.ts
                    component.spec.ts
    1. index.html: Include other .js, css. Define meta tag. Include the app-root component
    2. style.scss: Define the general style. e.g. 
      body{
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    border: 0;
    min-width: 400px;
}

  2. Create New Components & Services

    1. Component

                          ng generate component {name}
                    # it will generate 4 files {name}.component.*

                    ng generate component {name} --dry-run
                    # dry run

      The command also create the "import {}" statement in app.module
